title: Alexandre Dumas (Père)
provenance_text:
M. Knoedler & Co., New York, NY, until February 1925; purchased by Kenneth Seaver [1877-1969], Pittsburgh, PA and Oakmont, PA, on February 3, 1925 until January 24, 1949 [1]; his gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, January 1949.

Notes:
[1]. Purchased for $72; see invoice dated March 2, 1925 (for purchases made on February 3, 1925) in curatorial file. See also copy of a revised invoice from Knoedler, dated October 1, 1925, after returns of two other works that had also been purchased on February 3, 1925.
